name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-flight-tracker
title: Flight Tracker
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allows user to follow in real time a flight.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allows user to follow in real time a flight. This ACE, uses the external API( < https: //aerodatabox.p.rapidapi.com/flights/number/>) to get data of flight, please see <https://rapidapi.com/aedbx-aedbx/api/aerodatabox/> to get more information.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.

references.name: Adaptive Card Documentation
references.description: Detailed documentation on Adaptive Cards including the Adaptive Card designer.

references.name: Adaptive Card Extension Design Guidance
references.description: Design guidance for laying out Adaptive Card Extensions.
